urgent.action: Add 301 redirect from HTTP to HTTPS - losing 101 impressions with 0% CTR
urgent.reasoning: HTTP version is indexed separately and getting 101 impressions but 0 clicks. Users may not trust non-HTTPS pages.

urgent.action: Optimize menu page meta description - 37 impressions but only 2.7% CTR
urgent.reasoning: Menu page has good visibility but poor click-through. Better meta description highlighting unique offerings could improve CTR to 10%+.

quickWins.action: Add 'donuts near me Waikiki' to homepage H1 or hero section
quickWins.reasoning: Position #10 with 17 impressions. Moving to top 5 could capture 3-5x more clicks.

quickWins.action: Create dedicated landing page for 'donut near me' searches
quickWins.reasoning: Position #4 with only 2 impressions - likely needs content reinforcement.

quickWins.action: Add rich snippets (hours, rating stars) to improve visibility at position #20
quickWins.reasoning: 5 impressions at position #20 - structured data could help climb rankings.

opportunities.action: Optimize Korean pages - '말라사다 도넛' at #12.8 with 25% CTR shows Korean market potential
opportunities.reasoning: Korea driving 31 impressions (6.9% of traffic). Korean malasada content resonates well.

opportunities.action: Create Japanese landing page targeting Japanese tourists - 18 impressions from Japan
opportunities.reasoning: Japanese tourists are a key Waikiki demographic. Dedicated content could capture more searches.

opportunities.action: Fix About Kona Coffee page - 40 impressions but position #87, CTR 0%
opportunities.reasoning: Informational content exists but ranks poorly. Needs SEO overhaul with proper keyword targeting.

insights.observation: Desktop dominates (60% impressions) but mobile has higher CTR (3.3% vs 2.2%)
insights.suggestion: Mobile users convert better - ensure mobile UX is optimized for pre-opening hype

insights.observation: 'kona coffee donut' brand search at #1.1 with 25.7% CTR is excellent
insights.suggestion: Brand awareness is building. Continue social media to drive more branded searches.

insights.observation: 2 weeks until grand opening (Feb 25) - critical SEO window
insights.suggestion: Focus on local 'near me' keywords and Google Business Profile setup immediately
